textBox.richText: Trussworks has a new way to contact us!

Hi everyone, On occasion, everyone has a quick question that just doesn't seem worth starting an email for or picking up the phone. To help speed up the process of getting quick answers, we have added a chat link on our site. It is on our homepage and our main product pages so if you're on our site and have a quick question, just look for the little red floating head and feel free to "Click to Chat" and we'll help you out in a jiffy! Thanks and we hope to chat with you soon! Roy Trussworks
